Sentencas: La-Cr coating was applied to SUS 430 steel using magnetron sputtering for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) interconnects.
Titulo: La-Cr coating deposited by DC magnetron sputtering for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The coated steel was then thermally exposed to air at 800 degrees C for 5 weeks.
Titulo: La-Cr coating deposited by DC magnetron sputtering for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The results showed the formation of a LaCrO3 layer on top of a Cr2O3 sub-layer on the coated steel.
Titulo: La-Cr coating deposited by DC magnetron sputtering for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The LaCrO3 layer not only inhibited the growth of the Cr2O3 layer but also effectively retained out-migrating Cr species.
Titulo: La-Cr coating deposited by DC magnetron sputtering for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: After 5 weeks of exposure, the La-Cr coated steel achieved a surface scale area specific resistance (ASR) of 33.912 m Omega cm2.
Titulo: La-Cr coating deposited by DC magnetron sputtering for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications

Sentencas: The thermally developed LaCrO3 from the sputtered La-Cr coating shows promise for SOFC interconnects application.
Titulo: La-Cr coating deposited by DC magnetron sputtering for solid oxide fuel cell interconnect applications
